scripts.build:react:old: echo 'Build reactjs bundle...' && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] client/src/app.js --debug | exorcist client/public/js/bundle.js.map > client/public/js/bundle.js && uglifycss https://cdn.cloudkibo.com/public/assets/vendors/custom/css/custom-style.css --output client/public/dist/custom-style.min.css https://cdn.cloudkibo.com/public/Bootstrap/dist/css/latestBootstrap.css https://cdn.cloudkibo.com/public/assets/Emoji/picker.css https://cdn.cloudkibo.com/public/assets/dashboard/dashboard.css --output client/public/dist/kibopush.min.css &&echo 'Done compiling reactjs file'
scripts.build:react:prod: echo 'Build reactjs bundle...' && browserify client/src/app.js -o client/public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && echo 'Uglifying now' && uglifyjs client/public/js/bundle.js --output client/public/js/bundle.js && curl -F 'bundle=@client/public/js/bundle.js' https://cdn.cloudkibo.com/fileupload && exit 0
scripts.build:react:only: echo 'Build reactjs bundle for staging...' && browserify client/src/app.js -o client/public/js/bundle_staging.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && curl -F 'bundle=@client/public/js/bundle_staging.js' https://cdn.cloudkibo.com/fileupload && exit 0
scripts.lint: echo 'Pre-commit checks...' && standard --fix && echo "No code style errors found."
scripts.test: echo "Code tests are under construction by Sojharo" && exit 0
